glsa.title: PHProjekt: Remote code execution vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: PHProjekt contains a vulnerability that allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code.

background.p: PHProjekt is a modular groupware web application used to coordinate group activities and share files.

description.p: cYon discovered that the authform.inc.php script allows a remote user to define the global variable $path_pre.

impact.p: A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to force authform.inc.php to download and execute arbitrary PHP code with the privileges of the web server user.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All PHProjekt users should upgrade to the latest version:
